      • parse

        Order parse(java.math.BigInteger orderID,
            java.math.BigInteger customerID,
            java.math.BigInteger deliveryID,
            java.lang.String payMethod,
            java.math.BigInteger shipmentID,
            java.lang.String type,
            java.lang.String greeting,
            java.lang.String deliveryType,
            java.lang.String orderStatus,
            java.sql.Timestamp date,
            float price)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        parsing the data into new Order object
        Parameters:
        orderID - - the order's ID
        customerID - - the customer who made the order's ID
        deliveryID - - the delivery's details's ID (can be NULL)
        payMethod - - the payment method
        shipmentID - - the shipment ID (can be NULL)
        type - - the type of order by the ENUM
        greeting - - the greeting which can be attached to the order
        deliveryType - - the delivery type by the ENUM
        orderStatus - - the order's status by the ENUm
        date - - the order's date
        price - - the price of the order
        Returns:
        new Order created by the data above
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
